body: This +1 full plate is decorated with a wave and fish motif and often has tiny fins and scales worked into the design. Although the armor remains as heavy and bulky as normal full plate, the wearer of plate armor of the deep is treated as unarmored for purposes of Swim checks. The wearer can breathe underwater and can converse with any water-breathing creature with a language.
name: Plate Armor of the Deep
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Armor and Shields/Specific Magic Armor/Plate Armor of the Deep
